content: if you like this pattern you ll probably like my cozy knitting newsletter https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/936047/120780277461025946/share too subscribers get early access to test knits exclusive discounts and news from around the knittingverse **pattern notes** sometimes cats are full of mischief knocking over water glasses patting you on the face at 5am and strolling along the countertop for their own inscrutable reasons study in cats part 2 is an homage to these naughty-yet-loveable antics of our feline companions the hat is knit in the round from the bottom up and decreases are worked to create an x pattern at the crown
